snippet: The governor, Arsala Jamal of Logar Province, was a Canadian citizen who was thought highly of by military coalition leaders in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: The governor, Arsala Jamal of Logar Province, was a Canadian citizen who was thought highly of by military coalition leaders in Afghanistan.

headline.main: Afghan Provincial Governor Killed in Mosque Attack
headline.print_headline: Afghan Provincial Governor Killed in Mosque Attack
